name: The Usher Foundation V: The Eye
name_original: The Usher Foundation V: The Eye
description:
A fan game for Rusty Quill's The Magnus Archives podcast.

Your grandfather might have been a terrible person but at least you've got your inheritance, right?

Full-screen button is on the bottom right. The Magnus Archives is my favorite podcast, so I thought it would be cool to make a short fan game or two. Also a good excuse to explore more form stuff with Twine! 

INFORMATION ON GAME PERMISSIONS: Any permissions or information given within this game do not leave this game. The javascript that triggers the browser to request camera and microphone privilege does not do any actual recording.
